main event: An unidentified object was observed near McClellan AFB, California, described as a sphere emitting a yellow light.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 4 minutes., The observation was made at 0030 hours on April 15, 1965., The object appeared stationary at first., A flame-like object was seen moving in a northerly direction at a 10-15 degree elevation., No physical evidence was found and the sighting remains unidentified.
sighted object: a sphere with a yellow light
witness description: Report sourced from McClellan AFB officials
